biotools.summary: B-AMP is an Antimicrobial Peptide (AMP) repository for biofilms, consisting of a vast library of 5544 structural AMP models, AMPs annotated to relevant biofilm literature, and protein-peptide interaction models with potential biofilm targets.

bioschemas.name: B-AMP
